replies.body:
First gif is way too cute
What's the anime?

I know very little about anime, but the second shot, one of the girls holding up the frame for the tent looks like Madoka.

Edit: Wait, it's Yuru Yuri, according to an insider weeb friend.

> [{quoted}](name=A Girl Supp Main,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5PvzhB70,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-10T20:49:03.833+0000)
>
> according to an insider weeb friend.

So your inner weeb?
The second one is from Mob Psycho.
Only madhouse could animate somehting that good {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
That is BONES thou, not madhouse.

I thought madhouse did Mob Phyco
Wait
So you're telling me
There's another studio that animates as good as madhouse? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Ayyy someone else who knows bones

Fullmetal Alchemist represent! (not brotherhood go away)

>Wait, it's Yuru Yuri, according to an insider weeb friend. 

Can confirm.

I totally haven't used this hack: https://whatanime.ga/

> [{quoted}](name=Ninjapro2k,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5PvzhB70,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-10T20:34:15.394+0000)
>
> First gif is way too cute
> What's the anime?

It's called Yuru Yuri.
You have it backwards actually. Old riptose did way more damage. Plus back then you could actually stop a rengar q
It had the potential to hurt more, but I'd say the ability to parry spells and reflect CC was a worthy tradeoff.

What I thought was 
Reflected auto attack: light tapped on the head

Reflected CC + Attackspeed Slow + Slow: Welp I guess  I might as well be amputated.

Also suffering is relative.
at lest her old riposte did not interrupt movement
